48 static const std::string LOGNAME = "servo_calcs";
49 constexpr size_t ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD = 30; // Seconds to throttle logs inside loops
50 
51 namespace moveit_servo
52 {
53 namespace
54 {
55 // Helper function for detecting zeroed message
56 bool isNonZero(const geometry_msgs::TwistStamped& msg)
57 {
58  return msg.twist.linear.x != 0.0 || msg.twist.linear.y != 0.0 || msg.twist.linear.z != 0.0 ||
59  msg.twist.angular.x != 0.0 || msg.twist.angular.y != 0.0 || msg.twist.angular.z != 0.0;
60 }
61 
62 // Helper function for detecting zeroed message
63 bool isNonZero(const control_msgs::JointJog& msg)
64 {
65  bool all_zeros = true;
66  for (double delta : msg.velocities)
67  {
68  all_zeros &= (delta == 0.0);
69  };
70  return !all_zeros;
71 }
72 
73 // Helper function for converting Eigen::Isometry3d to geometry_msgs/TransformStamped
74 geometry_msgs::TransformStamped convertIsometryToTransform(const Eigen::Isometry3d& eigen_tf,
75  const std::string& parent_frame,
76  const std::string& child_frame)
77 {
78  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped output = tf2::eigenToTransform(eigen_tf);
79  output.header.frame_id = parent_frame;
80  output.child_frame_id = child_frame;
81 
82  return output;
83 }
84 } // namespace
85 
86 // Constructor for the class that handles servoing calculations
87 ServoCalcs::ServoCalcs(ros::NodeHandle& nh, ServoParameters& parameters,
88  const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr& planning_scene_monitor)
89  : nh_(nh)
90  , parameters_(parameters)
91  , planning_scene_monitor_(planning_scene_monitor)
92  , stop_requested_(true)
93  , paused_(false)
94 {
95  // MoveIt Setup
96  current_state_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState();
97  joint_model_group_ = current_state_->getJointModelGroup(parameters_.move_group_name);
98  prev_joint_velocity_ = Eigen::ArrayXd::Zero(joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModels().size());
99 
100  // Subscribe to command topics
101  twist_stamped_sub_ =
102  nh_.subscribe(parameters_.cartesian_command_in_topic, ROS_QUEUE_SIZE, &ServoCalcs::twistStampedCB, this);
103  joint_cmd_sub_ = nh_.subscribe(parameters_.joint_command_in_topic, ROS_QUEUE_SIZE, &ServoCalcs::jointCmdCB, this);
104 
105  // ROS Server for allowing drift in some dimensions
106  drift_dimensions_server_ = nh_.advertiseService(ros::names::append(nh_.getNamespace(), "change_drift_dimensions"),
107  &ServoCalcs::changeDriftDimensions, this);
108 
109  // ROS Server for changing the control dimensions
110  control_dimensions_server_ = nh_.advertiseService(ros::names::append(nh_.getNamespace(), "change_control_dimensions"),
111  &ServoCalcs::changeControlDimensions, this);
112 
113  // ROS Server to reset the status, e.g. so the arm can move again after a collision
114  reset_servo_status_ = nh_.advertiseService(ros::names::append(nh_.getNamespace(), "reset_servo_status"),
115  &ServoCalcs::resetServoStatus, this);
116 
117  // Publish and Subscribe to internal namespace topics
118  ros::NodeHandle internal_nh(nh_, "internal");
119  collision_velocity_scale_sub_ =
120  internal_nh.subscribe("collision_velocity_scale", ROS_QUEUE_SIZE, &ServoCalcs::collisionVelocityScaleCB, this);
121  worst_case_stop_time_pub_ = internal_nh.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("worst_case_stop_time", ROS_QUEUE_SIZE);
122 
123  // Publish freshly-calculated joints to the robot.
124  // Put the outgoing msg in the right format (trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory or std_msgs/Float64MultiArray).
125  if (parameters_.command_out_type == "trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory")
126  outgoing_cmd_pub_ = nh_.advertise<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory>(parameters_.command_out_topic, ROS_QUEUE_SIZE);
127  else if (parameters_.command_out_type == "std_msgs/Float64MultiArray")
128  outgoing_cmd_pub_ = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>(parameters_.command_out_topic, ROS_QUEUE_SIZE);
129 
130  // Publish status
131  status_pub_ = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Int8>(parameters_.status_topic, ROS_QUEUE_SIZE);
132 
133  internal_joint_state_.name = joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModelNames();
134  num_joints_ = internal_joint_state_.name.size();
135  internal_joint_state_.position.resize(num_joints_);
136  internal_joint_state_.velocity.resize(num_joints_);
137 
138  // A map for the indices of incoming joint commands
139  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < num_joints_; ++i)
140  {
141  joint_state_name_map_[internal_joint_state_.name[i]] = i;
142  }
143 
144  // Low-pass filters for the joint positions
145  for (size_t i = 0; i < num_joints_; ++i)
146  {
147  position_filters_.emplace_back(parameters_.low_pass_filter_coeff);
148  }
149 
150  // A matrix of all zeros is used to check whether matrices have been initialized
151  Eigen::Matrix3d empty_matrix;
152  empty_matrix.setZero();
153  tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_ = empty_matrix;
154  tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_ = empty_matrix;
155 }
156 
157 ServoCalcs::~ServoCalcs()
158 {
159  stop();
160 }
161 
162 void ServoCalcs::start()
163 {
164  // Stop the thread if we are currently running
165  stop();
166 
167  // We will update last_sent_command_ every time we start servo
168  auto initial_joint_trajectory = moveit::util::make_shared_from_pool<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory>();
169 
170  // When a joint_trajectory_controller receives a new command, a stamp of 0 indicates "begin immediately"
171  // See http://wiki.ros.org/joint_trajectory_controller#Trajectory_replacement
172  initial_joint_trajectory->header.stamp = ros::Time(0);
173  initial_joint_trajectory->header.frame_id = parameters_.planning_frame;
174  initial_joint_trajectory->joint_names = internal_joint_state_.name;
175  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint point;
176  point.time_from_start = ros::Duration(parameters_.publish_period);
177 
178  if (parameters_.publish_joint_positions)
179  planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState()->copyJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_,
180  point.positions);
181  if (parameters_.publish_joint_velocities)
182  {
183  std::vector<double> velocity(num_joints_);
184  point.velocities = velocity;
185  }
186  if (parameters_.publish_joint_accelerations)
187  {
188  // I do not know of a robot that takes acceleration commands.
189  // However, some controllers check that this data is non-empty.
190  // Send all zeros, for now.
191  point.accelerations.resize(num_joints_);
192  }
193  initial_joint_trajectory->points.push_back(point);
194  last_sent_command_ = initial_joint_trajectory;
195 
196  current_state_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState();
197  tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_ = current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.planning_frame).inverse() *
198  current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.ee_frame_name);
199  tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_ = current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.planning_frame).inverse() *
200  current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.robot_link_command_frame);
201 
202  stop_requested_ = false;
203  thread_ = std::thread([this] { mainCalcLoop(); });
204  new_input_cmd_ = false;
205 }
206 
207 void ServoCalcs::stop()
208 {
209  // Request stop
210  stop_requested_ = true;
211 
212  // Notify condition variable in case the thread is blocked on it
213  {
214  // scope so the mutex is unlocked after so the thread can continue
215  // and therefore be joinable
216  const std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(input_mutex_);
217  new_input_cmd_ = false;
218  input_cv_.notify_all();
219  }
220 
221  // Join the thread
222  if (thread_.joinable())
223  {
224  thread_.join();
225  }
226 }
227 
228 void ServoCalcs::mainCalcLoop()
229 {
230  ros::Rate rate(1.0 / parameters_.publish_period);
231 
232  while (ros::ok() && !stop_requested_)
233  {
234  // lock the input state mutex
235  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> input_lock(input_mutex_);
236 
237  // low latency mode -- begin calculations as soon as a new command is received.
238  if (parameters_.low_latency_mode)
239  {
240  input_cv_.wait(input_lock, [this] { return (new_input_cmd_ || stop_requested_); });
241  }
242 
243  // reset new_input_cmd_ flag
244  new_input_cmd_ = false;
245 
246  // run servo calcs
247  const auto start_time = ros::Time::now();
248  calculateSingleIteration();
249  const auto run_duration = ros::Time::now() - start_time;
250 
251  // Log warning when the run duration was longer than the period
252  if (run_duration.toSec() > parameters_.publish_period)
253  {
254  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
255  "run_duration: " << run_duration.toSec() << " (" << parameters_.publish_period
256  << ")");
257  }
258 
259  // normal mode, unlock input mutex and wait for the period of the loop
260  if (!parameters_.low_latency_mode)
261  {
262  input_lock.unlock();
263  rate.sleep();
264  }
265  }
266 }
267 
268 void ServoCalcs::calculateSingleIteration()
269 {
270  // Publish status each loop iteration
271  auto status_msg = moveit::util::make_shared_from_pool<std_msgs::Int8>();
272  status_msg->data = static_cast<int8_t>(status_);
273  status_pub_.publish(status_msg);
274 
275  // Always update the joints and end-effector transform for 2 reasons:
276  // 1) in case the getCommandFrameTransform() method is being used
277  // 2) so the low-pass filters are up to date and don't cause a jump
278  updateJoints();
279 
280  // Update from latest state
281  current_state_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState();
282 
283  if (latest_twist_stamped_)
284  twist_stamped_cmd_ = *latest_twist_stamped_;
285  if (latest_joint_cmd_)
286  joint_servo_cmd_ = *latest_joint_cmd_;
287 
288  // Check for stale cmds
289  twist_command_is_stale_ =
290  ((ros::Time::now() - latest_twist_command_stamp_) >= ros::Duration(parameters_.incoming_command_timeout));
291  joint_command_is_stale_ =
292  ((ros::Time::now() - latest_joint_command_stamp_) >= ros::Duration(parameters_.incoming_command_timeout));
293 
294  have_nonzero_twist_stamped_ = latest_nonzero_twist_stamped_;
295  have_nonzero_joint_command_ = latest_nonzero_joint_cmd_;
296 
297  // Get the transform from MoveIt planning frame to servoing command frame
298  // Calculate this transform to ensure it is available via C++ API
299  // We solve (planning_frame -> base -> robot_link_command_frame)
300  // by computing (base->planning_frame)^-1 * (base->robot_link_command_frame)
301  tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_ = current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.planning_frame).inverse() *
302  current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.robot_link_command_frame);
303 
304  // Calculate the transform from MoveIt planning frame to End Effector frame
305  // Calculate this transform to ensure it is available via C++ API
306  tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_ = current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.planning_frame).inverse() *
307  current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.ee_frame_name);
308 
309  have_nonzero_command_ = have_nonzero_twist_stamped_ || have_nonzero_joint_command_;
310 
311  // Don't end this function without updating the filters
312  updated_filters_ = false;
313 
314  // If paused or while waiting for initial servo commands, just keep the low-pass filters up to date with current
315  // joints so a jump doesn't occur when restarting
316  if (wait_for_servo_commands_ || paused_)
317  {
318  resetLowPassFilters(original_joint_state_);
319 
320  // Check if there are any new commands with valid timestamp
321  wait_for_servo_commands_ =
322  twist_stamped_cmd_.header.stamp == ros::Time(0.) && joint_servo_cmd_.header.stamp == ros::Time(0.);
323 
324  // Early exit
325  return;
326  }
327 
328  // If not waiting for initial command, and not paused.
329  // Do servoing calculations only if the robot should move, for efficiency
330  // Create new outgoing joint trajectory command message
331  auto joint_trajectory = moveit::util::make_shared_from_pool<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory>();
332 
333  // Prioritize cartesian servoing above joint servoing
334  // Only run commands if not stale and nonzero
335  if (have_nonzero_twist_stamped_ && !twist_command_is_stale_)
336  {
337  if (!cartesianServoCalcs(twist_stamped_cmd_, *joint_trajectory))
338  {
339  resetLowPassFilters(original_joint_state_);
340  return;
341  }
342  }
343  else if (have_nonzero_joint_command_ && !joint_command_is_stale_)
344  {
345  if (!jointServoCalcs(joint_servo_cmd_, *joint_trajectory))
346  {
347  resetLowPassFilters(original_joint_state_);
348  return;
349  }
350  }
351  else
352  {
353  // Joint trajectory is not populated with anything, so set it to the last positions and 0 velocity
354  *joint_trajectory = *last_sent_command_;
355  for (auto& point : joint_trajectory->points)
356  {
357  point.velocities.assign(point.velocities.size(), 0);
358  }
359  }
360 
361  // Print a warning to the user if both are stale
362  if (twist_command_is_stale_ && joint_command_is_stale_)
363  {
364  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(10, LOGNAME,
365  "Stale command. "
366  "Try a larger 'incoming_command_timeout' parameter?");
367  }
368 
369  // If we should halt
370  if (!have_nonzero_command_)
371  {
372  suddenHalt(*joint_trajectory);
373  have_nonzero_twist_stamped_ = false;
374  have_nonzero_joint_command_ = false;
375  }
376 
377  // Skip the servoing publication if all inputs have been zero for several cycles in a row.
378  // num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish == 0 signifies that we should keep republishing forever.
379  if (!have_nonzero_command_ && (parameters_.num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish != 0) &&
380  (zero_velocity_count_ > parameters_.num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish))
381  {
382  ok_to_publish_ = false;
383  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, "All-zero command. Doing nothing.");
384  }
385  else
386  {
387  ok_to_publish_ = true;
388  }
389 
390  // Store last zero-velocity message flag to prevent superfluous warnings.
391  // Cartesian and joint commands must both be zero.
392  if (!have_nonzero_command_)
393  {
394  // Avoid overflow
395  if (zero_velocity_count_ < std::numeric_limits<int>::max())
396  ++zero_velocity_count_;
397  }
398  else
399  {
400  zero_velocity_count_ = 0;
401  }
402 
403  if (ok_to_publish_ && !paused_)
404  {
405  // Put the outgoing msg in the right format
406  // (trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory or std_msgs/Float64MultiArray).
407  if (parameters_.command_out_type == "trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory")
408  {
409  // When a joint_trajectory_controller receives a new command, a stamp of 0 indicates "begin immediately"
410  // See http://wiki.ros.org/joint_trajectory_controller#Trajectory_replacement
411  joint_trajectory->header.stamp = ros::Time(0);
412  outgoing_cmd_pub_.publish(joint_trajectory);
413  }
414  else if (parameters_.command_out_type == "std_msgs/Float64MultiArray")
415  {
416  auto joints = moveit::util::make_shared_from_pool<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>();
417  if (parameters_.publish_joint_positions && !joint_trajectory->points.empty())
418  joints->data = joint_trajectory->points[0].positions;
419  else if (parameters_.publish_joint_velocities && !joint_trajectory->points.empty())
420  joints->data = joint_trajectory->points[0].velocities;
421  outgoing_cmd_pub_.publish(joints);
422  }
423 
424  last_sent_command_ = joint_trajectory;
425  }
426 
427  // Update the filters if we haven't yet
428  if (!updated_filters_)
429  resetLowPassFilters(original_joint_state_);
430 }
431 // Perform the servoing calculations
432 bool ServoCalcs::cartesianServoCalcs(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped& cmd,
433  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory)
434 {
435  // Check for nan's in the incoming command
436  if (std::isnan(cmd.twist.linear.x) || std::isnan(cmd.twist.linear.y) || std::isnan(cmd.twist.linear.z) ||
437  std::isnan(cmd.twist.angular.x) || std::isnan(cmd.twist.angular.y) || std::isnan(cmd.twist.angular.z))
438  {
439  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
440  "nan in incoming command. Skipping this datapoint.");
441  return false;
442  }
443 
444  // If incoming commands should be in the range [-1:1], check for |delta|>1
445  if (parameters_.command_in_type == "unitless")
446  {
447  if ((fabs(cmd.twist.linear.x) > 1) || (fabs(cmd.twist.linear.y) > 1) || (fabs(cmd.twist.linear.z) > 1) ||
448  (fabs(cmd.twist.angular.x) > 1) || (fabs(cmd.twist.angular.y) > 1) || (fabs(cmd.twist.angular.z) > 1))
449  {
450  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
451  "Component of incoming command is >1. Skipping this datapoint.");
452  return false;
453  }
454  }
455 
456  // Set uncontrolled dimensions to 0 in command frame
457  if (!control_dimensions_[0])
458  cmd.twist.linear.x = 0;
459  if (!control_dimensions_[1])
460  cmd.twist.linear.y = 0;
461  if (!control_dimensions_[2])
462  cmd.twist.linear.z = 0;
463  if (!control_dimensions_[3])
464  cmd.twist.angular.x = 0;
465  if (!control_dimensions_[4])
466  cmd.twist.angular.y = 0;
467  if (!control_dimensions_[5])
468  cmd.twist.angular.z = 0;
469 
470  // Transform the command to the MoveGroup planning frame
471  if (cmd.header.frame_id != parameters_.planning_frame)
472  {
473  Eigen::Vector3d translation_vector(cmd.twist.linear.x, cmd.twist.linear.y, cmd.twist.linear.z);
474  Eigen::Vector3d angular_vector(cmd.twist.angular.x, cmd.twist.angular.y, cmd.twist.angular.z);
475 
476  // If the incoming frame is empty or is the command frame, we use the previously calculated tf
477  if (cmd.header.frame_id.empty() || cmd.header.frame_id == parameters_.robot_link_command_frame)
478  {
479  translation_vector = tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_.linear() * translation_vector;
480  angular_vector = tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_.linear() * angular_vector;
481  }
482  else if (cmd.header.frame_id == parameters_.ee_frame_name)
483  {
484  // If the frame is the EE frame, we already have that transform as well
485  translation_vector = tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_.linear() * translation_vector;
486  angular_vector = tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_.linear() * angular_vector;
487  }
488  else
489  {
490  // We solve (planning_frame -> base -> cmd.header.frame_id)
491  // by computing (base->planning_frame)^-1 * (base->cmd.header.frame_id)
492  const auto tf_moveit_to_incoming_cmd_frame =
493  current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(parameters_.planning_frame).inverse() *
494  current_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(cmd.header.frame_id);
495 
496  translation_vector = tf_moveit_to_incoming_cmd_frame.linear() * translation_vector;
497  angular_vector = tf_moveit_to_incoming_cmd_frame.linear() * angular_vector;
498  }
499 
500  // Put these components back into a TwistStamped
501  cmd.header.frame_id = parameters_.planning_frame;
502  cmd.twist.linear.x = translation_vector(0);
503  cmd.twist.linear.y = translation_vector(1);
504  cmd.twist.linear.z = translation_vector(2);
505  cmd.twist.angular.x = angular_vector(0);
506  cmd.twist.angular.y = angular_vector(1);
507  cmd.twist.angular.z = angular_vector(2);
508  }
509 
510  Eigen::VectorXd delta_x = scaleCartesianCommand(cmd);
511 
512  // Convert from cartesian commands to joint commands
513  Eigen::MatrixXd jacobian = current_state_->getJacobian(joint_model_group_);
514 
515  // May allow some dimensions to drift, based on drift_dimensions
516  // i.e. take advantage of task redundancy.
517  // Remove the Jacobian rows corresponding to True in the vector drift_dimensions
518  // Work backwards through the 6-vector so indices don't get out of order
519  for (auto dimension = jacobian.rows() - 1; dimension >= 0; --dimension)
520  {
521  if (drift_dimensions_[dimension] && jacobian.rows() > 1)
522  {
523  removeDimension(jacobian, delta_x, dimension);
524  }
525  }
526 
527  Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::MatrixXd> svd =
528  Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::MatrixXd>(jacobian, Eigen::ComputeThinU | Eigen::ComputeThinV);
529  Eigen::MatrixXd matrix_s = svd.singularValues().asDiagonal();
530  Eigen::MatrixXd pseudo_inverse = svd.matrixV() * matrix_s.inverse() * svd.matrixU().transpose();
531 
532  delta_theta_ = pseudo_inverse * delta_x;
533 
534  enforceVelLimits(delta_theta_);
535 
536  // If close to a collision or a singularity, decelerate
537  applyVelocityScaling(delta_theta_, velocityScalingFactorForSingularity(delta_x, svd, pseudo_inverse));
538 
539  prev_joint_velocity_ = delta_theta_ / parameters_.publish_period;
540 
541  return convertDeltasToOutgoingCmd(joint_trajectory);
542 }
543 
544 bool ServoCalcs::jointServoCalcs(const control_msgs::JointJog& cmd, trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory)
545 {
546  // Check for nan's
547  for (double velocity : cmd.velocities)
548  {
549  if (std::isnan(velocity))
550  {
551  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
552  "nan in incoming command. Skipping this datapoint.");
553  return false;
554  }
555  }
556 
557  // Apply user-defined scaling
558  delta_theta_ = scaleJointCommand(cmd);
559 
560  enforceVelLimits(delta_theta_);
561 
562  // If close to a collision, decelerate
563  applyVelocityScaling(delta_theta_, 1.0 /* scaling for singularities -- ignore for joint motions */);
564 
565  prev_joint_velocity_ = delta_theta_ / parameters_.publish_period;
566 
567  return convertDeltasToOutgoingCmd(joint_trajectory);
568 }
569 
570 bool ServoCalcs::convertDeltasToOutgoingCmd(trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory)
571 {
572  internal_joint_state_ = original_joint_state_;
573  if (!addJointIncrements(internal_joint_state_, delta_theta_))
574  return false;
575 
576  lowPassFilterPositions(internal_joint_state_);
577 
578  // Calculate joint velocities here so that positions are filtered and SRDF bounds still get checked
579  calculateJointVelocities(internal_joint_state_, delta_theta_);
580 
581  composeJointTrajMessage(internal_joint_state_, joint_trajectory);
582 
583  if (!enforcePositionLimits())
584  {
585  suddenHalt(joint_trajectory);
586  status_ = StatusCode::JOINT_BOUND;
587  }
588 
589  // done with calculations
590  if (parameters_.use_gazebo)
591  {
592  insertRedundantPointsIntoTrajectory(joint_trajectory, gazebo_redundant_message_count_);
593  }
594 
595  return true;
596 }
597 
598 // Spam several redundant points into the trajectory. The first few may be skipped if the
599 // time stamp is in the past when it reaches the client. Needed for gazebo simulation.
600 void ServoCalcs::insertRedundantPointsIntoTrajectory(trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory, int count) const
601 {
602  joint_trajectory.points.resize(count);
603  auto point = joint_trajectory.points[0];
604  // Start from 2nd point (i = 1) because we already have the first point.
605  // The timestamps are shifted up one period since first point is at 1 * publish_period, not 0.
606  for (int i = 1; i < count; ++i)
607  {
608  point.time_from_start = ros::Duration((i + 1) * parameters_.publish_period);
609  joint_trajectory.points[i] = point;
610  }
611 }
612 
613 void ServoCalcs::lowPassFilterPositions(sensor_msgs::JointState& joint_state)
614 {
615  for (size_t i = 0; i < position_filters_.size(); ++i)
616  {
617  joint_state.position[i] = position_filters_[i].filter(joint_state.position[i]);
618  }
619 
620  updated_filters_ = true;
621 }
622 
623 void ServoCalcs::resetLowPassFilters(const sensor_msgs::JointState& joint_state)
624 {
625  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < position_filters_.size(); ++i)
626  {
627  position_filters_[i].reset(joint_state.position[i]);
628  }
629 
630  updated_filters_ = true;
631 }
632 
633 void ServoCalcs::calculateJointVelocities(sensor_msgs::JointState& joint_state, const Eigen::ArrayXd& delta_theta)
634 {
635  for (int i = 0; i < delta_theta.size(); ++i)
636  {
637  joint_state.velocity[i] = delta_theta[i] / parameters_.publish_period;
638  }
639 }
640 
641 void ServoCalcs::composeJointTrajMessage(const sensor_msgs::JointState& joint_state,
642  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory) const
643 {
644  // When a joint_trajectory_controller receives a new command, a stamp of 0 indicates "begin immediately"
645  // See http://wiki.ros.org/joint_trajectory_controller#Trajectory_replacement
646  joint_trajectory.header.stamp = ros::Time(0);
647  joint_trajectory.header.frame_id = parameters_.planning_frame;
648  joint_trajectory.joint_names = joint_state.name;
649 
650  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint point;
651  point.time_from_start = ros::Duration(parameters_.publish_period);
652  if (parameters_.publish_joint_positions)
653  point.positions = joint_state.position;
654  if (parameters_.publish_joint_velocities)
655  point.velocities = joint_state.velocity;
656  if (parameters_.publish_joint_accelerations)
657  {
658  // I do not know of a robot that takes acceleration commands.
659  // However, some controllers check that this data is non-empty.
660  // Send all zeros, for now.
661  std::vector<double> acceleration(num_joints_);
662  point.accelerations = acceleration;
663  }
664  joint_trajectory.points.push_back(point);
665 }
666 
667 // Apply velocity scaling for proximity of collisions and singularities.
668 void ServoCalcs::applyVelocityScaling(Eigen::ArrayXd& delta_theta, double singularity_scale)
669 {
670  double collision_scale = collision_velocity_scale_;
671 
672  if (collision_scale > 0 && collision_scale < 1)
673  {
674  status_ = StatusCode::DECELERATE_FOR_COLLISION;
675  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, SERVO_STATUS_CODE_MAP.at(status_));
676  }
677  else if (collision_scale == 0)
678  {
679  status_ = StatusCode::HALT_FOR_COLLISION;
680  }
681 
682  delta_theta = collision_scale * singularity_scale * delta_theta;
683 
684  if (status_ == StatusCode::HALT_FOR_COLLISION)
685  {
686  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(3, LOGNAME, "Halting for collision!");
687  delta_theta_.setZero();
688  }
689 }
690 
691 // Possibly calculate a velocity scaling factor, due to proximity of singularity and direction of motion
692 double ServoCalcs::velocityScalingFactorForSingularity(const Eigen::VectorXd& commanded_velocity,
693  const Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::MatrixXd>& svd,
694  const Eigen::MatrixXd& pseudo_inverse)
695 {
696  double velocity_scale = 1;
697  std::size_t num_dimensions = commanded_velocity.size();
698 
699  // Find the direction away from nearest singularity.
700  // The last column of U from the SVD of the Jacobian points directly toward or away from the singularity.
701  // The sign can flip at any time, so we have to do some extra checking.
702  // Look ahead to see if the Jacobian's condition will decrease.
703  Eigen::VectorXd vector_toward_singularity = svd.matrixU().col(num_dimensions - 1);
704 
705  double ini_condition = svd.singularValues()(0) / svd.singularValues()(svd.singularValues().size() - 1);
706 
707  // This singular vector tends to flip direction unpredictably. See R. Bro,
708  // "Resolving the Sign Ambiguity in the Singular Value Decomposition".
709  // Look ahead to see if the Jacobian's condition will decrease in this
710  // direction. Start with a scaled version of the singular vector
711  Eigen::VectorXd delta_x(num_dimensions);
712  double scale = 100;
713  delta_x = vector_toward_singularity / scale;
714 
715  // Calculate a small change in joints
716  Eigen::VectorXd new_theta;
717  current_state_->copyJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_, new_theta);
718  new_theta += pseudo_inverse * delta_x;
719  current_state_->setJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_, new_theta);
720  Eigen::MatrixXd new_jacobian = current_state_->getJacobian(joint_model_group_);
721 
722  Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::MatrixXd> new_svd(new_jacobian);
723  double new_condition = new_svd.singularValues()(0) / new_svd.singularValues()(new_svd.singularValues().size() - 1);
724  // If new_condition < ini_condition, the singular vector does point towards a
725  // singularity. Otherwise, flip its direction.
726  if (ini_condition >= new_condition)
727  {
728  vector_toward_singularity *= -1;
729  }
730 
731  // If this dot product is positive, we're moving toward singularity ==> decelerate
732  double dot = vector_toward_singularity.dot(commanded_velocity);
733  if (dot > 0)
734  {
735  // Ramp velocity down linearly when the Jacobian condition is between lower_singularity_threshold and
736  // hard_stop_singularity_threshold, and we're moving towards the singularity
737  if ((ini_condition > parameters_.lower_singularity_threshold) &&
738  (ini_condition < parameters_.hard_stop_singularity_threshold))
739  {
740  velocity_scale = 1. - (ini_condition - parameters_.lower_singularity_threshold) /
741  (parameters_.hard_stop_singularity_threshold - parameters_.lower_singularity_threshold);
742  status_ = StatusCode::DECELERATE_FOR_SINGULARITY;
743  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, SERVO_STATUS_CODE_MAP.at(status_));
744  }
745 
746  // Very close to singularity, so halt.
747  else if (ini_condition > parameters_.hard_stop_singularity_threshold)
748  {
749  velocity_scale = 0;
750  status_ = StatusCode::HALT_FOR_SINGULARITY;
751  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, SERVO_STATUS_CODE_MAP.at(status_));
752  }
753  }
754 
755  return velocity_scale;
756 }
757 
758 void ServoCalcs::enforceVelLimits(Eigen::ArrayXd& delta_theta)
759 {
760  // Convert to joint angle velocities for checking and applying joint specific velocity limits.
761  Eigen::ArrayXd velocity = delta_theta / parameters_.publish_period;
762 
763  std::size_t joint_delta_index{ 0 };
764  double velocity_scaling_factor{ 1.0 };
765  for (const moveit::core::JointModel* joint : joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModels())
766  {
767  const auto& bounds = joint->getVariableBounds(joint->getName());
768  if (bounds.velocity_bounded_ && velocity(joint_delta_index) != 0.0)
769  {
770  const double unbounded_velocity = velocity(joint_delta_index);
771  // Clamp each joint velocity to a joint specific [min_velocity, max_velocity] range.
772  const auto bounded_velocity = std::min(std::max(unbounded_velocity, bounds.min_velocity_), bounds.max_velocity_);
773  velocity_scaling_factor = std::min(velocity_scaling_factor, bounded_velocity / unbounded_velocity);
774  }
775  ++joint_delta_index;
776  }
777 
778  // Convert back to joint angle increments.
779  delta_theta = velocity_scaling_factor * velocity * parameters_.publish_period;
780 }
781 
782 bool ServoCalcs::enforcePositionLimits()
783 {
784  bool halting = false;
785 
786  for (auto joint : joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModels())
787  {
788  // Halt if we're past a joint margin and joint velocity is moving even farther past
789  double joint_angle = 0;
790  for (std::size_t c = 0; c < original_joint_state_.name.size(); ++c)
791  {
792  if (original_joint_state_.name[c] == joint->getName())
793  {
794  joint_angle = original_joint_state_.position.at(c);
795  break;
796  }
797  }
798  if (!current_state_->satisfiesPositionBounds(joint, -parameters_.joint_limit_margin))
799  {
800  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::JointLimits> limits = joint->getVariableBoundsMsg();
801 
802  // Joint limits are not defined for some joints. Skip them.
803  if (!limits.empty())
804  {
805  if ((current_state_->getJointVelocities(joint)[0] < 0 &&
806  (joint_angle < (limits[0].min_position + parameters_.joint_limit_margin))) ||
807  (current_state_->getJointVelocities(joint)[0] > 0 &&
808  (joint_angle > (limits[0].max_position - parameters_.joint_limit_margin))))
809  {
810  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
811  ros::this_node::getName() << " " << joint->getName()
812  << " close to a "
813  " position limit. Halting.");
814  halting = true;
815  }
816  }
817  }
818  }
819  return !halting;
820 }
821 
822 // Suddenly halt for a joint limit or other critical issue.
823 // Is handled differently for position vs. velocity control.
824 void ServoCalcs::suddenHalt(trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory)
825 {
826  // Prepare the joint trajectory message to stop the robot
827  joint_trajectory.points.clear();
828  joint_trajectory.points.emplace_back();
829  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint& point = joint_trajectory.points.front();
830 
831  // When sending out trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory type messages, the "trajectory" is just a single point.
832  // That point cannot have the same timestamp as the start of trajectory execution since that would mean the
833  // arm has to reach the first trajectory point the moment execution begins. To prevent errors about points
834  // being 0 seconds in the past, the smallest supported timestep is added as time from start to the trajectory point.
835  point.time_from_start.fromNSec(1);
836 
837  if (parameters_.publish_joint_positions)
838  point.positions.resize(num_joints_);
839  if (parameters_.publish_joint_velocities)
840  point.velocities.resize(num_joints_);
841 
842  // Assert the following loop is safe to execute
843  assert(original_joint_state_.position.size() >= num_joints_);
844 
845  // Set the positions and velocities vectors
846  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < num_joints_; ++i)
847  {
848  // For position-controlled robots, can reset the joints to a known, good state
849  if (parameters_.publish_joint_positions)
850  point.positions[i] = original_joint_state_.position[i];
851 
852  // For velocity-controlled robots, stop
853  if (parameters_.publish_joint_velocities)
854  point.velocities[i] = 0;
855  }
856 }
857 
858 // Parse the incoming joint msg for the joints of our MoveGroup
859 void ServoCalcs::updateJoints()
860 {
861  // Get the latest joint group positions
862  current_state_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState();
863  current_state_->copyJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_, internal_joint_state_.position);
864  current_state_->copyJointGroupVelocities(joint_model_group_, internal_joint_state_.velocity);
865 
866  // Cache the original joints in case they need to be reset
867  original_joint_state_ = internal_joint_state_;
868 
869  // Calculate worst case joint stop time, for collision checking
870  std::string joint_name = "";
871  moveit::core::JointModel::Bounds kinematic_bounds;
872  double accel_limit = 0;
873  double joint_velocity = 0;
874  double worst_case_stop_time = 0;
875  for (size_t jt_state_idx = 0; jt_state_idx < internal_joint_state_.velocity.size(); ++jt_state_idx)
876  {
877  joint_name = internal_joint_state_.name[jt_state_idx];
878 
879  // Get acceleration limit for this joint
880  for (auto joint_model : joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModels())
881  {
882  if (joint_model->getName() == joint_name)
883  {
884  kinematic_bounds = joint_model->getVariableBounds();
885  // Some joints do not have acceleration limits
886  if (kinematic_bounds[0].acceleration_bounded_)
887  {
888  // Be conservative when calculating overall acceleration limit from min and max limits
889  accel_limit =
890  std::min(fabs(kinematic_bounds[0].min_acceleration_), fabs(kinematic_bounds[0].max_acceleration_));
891  }
892  else
893  {
894  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
895  "An acceleration limit is not defined for this joint; minimum stop distance "
896  "should not be used for collision checking");
897  }
898  break;
899  }
900  }
901 
902  // Get the current joint velocity
903  joint_velocity = internal_joint_state_.velocity[jt_state_idx];
904 
905  // Calculate worst case stop time
906  worst_case_stop_time = std::max(worst_case_stop_time, fabs(joint_velocity / accel_limit));
907  }
908 
909  // publish message
910  {
911  auto msg = moveit::util::make_shared_from_pool<std_msgs::Float64>();
912  msg->data = worst_case_stop_time;
913  worst_case_stop_time_pub_.publish(msg);
914  }
915 }
916 
917 // Scale the incoming servo command
918 Eigen::VectorXd ServoCalcs::scaleCartesianCommand(const geometry_msgs::TwistStamped& command) const
919 {
920  Eigen::VectorXd result(6);
921 
922  // Apply user-defined scaling if inputs are unitless [-1:1]
923  if (parameters_.command_in_type == "unitless")
924  {
925  result[0] = parameters_.linear_scale * parameters_.publish_period * command.twist.linear.x;
926  result[1] = parameters_.linear_scale * parameters_.publish_period * command.twist.linear.y;
927  result[2] = parameters_.linear_scale * parameters_.publish_period * command.twist.linear.z;
928  result[3] = parameters_.rotational_scale * parameters_.publish_period * command.twist.angular.x;
929  result[4] = parameters_.rotational_scale * parameters_.publish_period * command.twist.angular.y;
930  result[5] = parameters_.rotational_scale * parameters_.publish_period * command.twist.angular.z;
931  }
932  // Otherwise, commands are in m/s and rad/s
933  else if (parameters_.command_in_type == "speed_units")
934  {
935  result[0] = command.twist.linear.x * parameters_.publish_period;
936  result[1] = command.twist.linear.y * parameters_.publish_period;
937  result[2] = command.twist.linear.z * parameters_.publish_period;
938  result[3] = command.twist.angular.x * parameters_.publish_period;
939  result[4] = command.twist.angular.y * parameters_.publish_period;
940  result[5] = command.twist.angular.z * parameters_.publish_period;
941  }
942  else
943  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, "Unexpected command_in_type");
944 
945  return result;
946 }
947 
948 Eigen::VectorXd ServoCalcs::scaleJointCommand(const control_msgs::JointJog& command) const
949 {
950  Eigen::VectorXd result(num_joints_);
951  result.setZero();
952 
953  std::size_t c;
954  for (std::size_t m = 0; m < command.joint_names.size(); ++m)
955  {
956  try
957  {
958  c = joint_state_name_map_.at(command.joint_names[m]);
959  }
960  catch (const std::out_of_range& e)
961  {
962  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, "Ignoring joint " << command.joint_names[m]);
963  continue;
964  }
965  // Apply user-defined scaling if inputs are unitless [-1:1]
966  if (parameters_.command_in_type == "unitless")
967  result[c] = command.velocities[m] * parameters_.joint_scale * parameters_.publish_period;
968  // Otherwise, commands are in m/s and rad/s
969  else if (parameters_.command_in_type == "speed_units")
970  result[c] = command.velocities[m] * parameters_.publish_period;
971  else
972  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME, "Unexpected command_in_type, check yaml file.");
973  }
974 
975  return result;
976 }
977 
978 // Add the deltas to each joint
979 bool ServoCalcs::addJointIncrements(sensor_msgs::JointState& output, const Eigen::VectorXd& increments) const
980 {
981  for (std::size_t i = 0, size = static_cast<std::size_t>(increments.size()); i < size; ++i)
982  {
983  try
984  {
985  output.position[i] += increments[i];
986  }
987  catch (const std::out_of_range& e)
988  {
989  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
990  ros::this_node::getName() << " Lengths of output and "
991  "increments do not match.");
992  return false;
993  }
994  }
995 
996  return true;
997 }
998 
999 void ServoCalcs::removeDimension(Eigen::MatrixXd& jacobian, Eigen::VectorXd& delta_x, unsigned int row_to_remove)
1000 {
1001  unsigned int num_rows = jacobian.rows() - 1;
1002  unsigned int num_cols = jacobian.cols();
1003 
1004  if (row_to_remove < num_rows)
1005  {
1006  jacobian.block(row_to_remove, 0, num_rows - row_to_remove, num_cols) =
1007  jacobian.block(row_to_remove + 1, 0, num_rows - row_to_remove, num_cols);
1008  delta_x.segment(row_to_remove, num_rows - row_to_remove) =
1009  delta_x.segment(row_to_remove + 1, num_rows - row_to_remove);
1010  }
1011  jacobian.conservativeResize(num_rows, num_cols);
1012  delta_x.conservativeResize(num_rows);
1013 }
1014 
1015 bool ServoCalcs::getCommandFrameTransform(Eigen::Isometry3d& transform)
1016 {
1017  const std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(input_mutex_);
1018  transform = tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_;
1019 
1020  // All zeros means the transform wasn't initialized, so return false
1021  return !transform.matrix().isZero(0);
1022 }
1023 
1024 bool ServoCalcs::getCommandFrameTransform(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped& transform)
1025 {
1026  const std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(input_mutex_);
1027  // All zeros means the transform wasn't initialized, so return false
1028  if (tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_.matrix().isZero(0))
1029  {
1030  return false;
1031  }
1032 
1033  transform = convertIsometryToTransform(tf_moveit_to_robot_cmd_frame_, parameters_.planning_frame,
1034  parameters_.robot_link_command_frame);
1035  return true;
1036 }

1041  transform = tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_;
1042

1044  return !transform.matrix().isZero(0);
1045 }

1047 bool ServoCalcs::getEEFrameTransform(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped& transform)
1048 {
1049  const std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(input_mutex_);
1050  // All zeros means the transform wasn't initialized, so return false
1051  if (tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_.matrix().isZero(0))
1052  {
1053  return false;
1054  }
1055 
1056  transform = convertIsometryToTransform(tf_moveit_to_ee_frame_, parameters_.planning_frame, parameters_.ee_frame_name);

1060 void ServoCalcs::twistStampedCB(const geometry_msgs::TwistStampedConstPtr& msg)
1061 {
1062  const std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(input_mutex_);
1063  latest_twist_stamped_ = msg;
1064  latest_nonzero_twist_stamped_ = isNonZero(*latest_twist_stamped_);
1065 
1066  if (msg->header.stamp != ros::Time(0.))
1067  latest_twist_command_stamp_ = msg->header.stamp;
1068 
1069  // notify that we have a new input
1070  new_input_cmd_ = true;
1071  input_cv_.notify_all();
1072 }

1074 void ServoCalcs::jointCmdCB(const control_msgs::JointJogConstPtr& msg)
1075 {
1076  const std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(input_mutex_);
1077  latest_joint_cmd_ = msg;
1078  latest_nonzero_joint_cmd_ = isNonZero(*latest_joint_cmd_);
1079 
1080  if (msg->header.stamp != ros::Time(0.))
1081  latest_joint_command_stamp_ = msg->header.stamp;
1082 
1083  // notify that we have a new input
1084  new_input_cmd_ = true;
1085  input_cv_.notify_all();
1086 }

1093 bool ServoCalcs::changeDriftDimensions(moveit_msgs::ChangeDriftDimensions::Request& req,
1094  moveit_msgs::ChangeDriftDimensions::Response& res)
1095 {
1096  drift_dimensions_[0] = req.drift_x_translation;
1097  drift_dimensions_[1] = req.drift_y_translation;
1098  drift_dimensions_[2] = req.drift_z_translation;
1099  drift_dimensions_[3] = req.drift_x_rotation;
1100  drift_dimensions_[4] = req.drift_y_rotation;
1101  drift_dimensions_[5] = req.drift_z_rotation;
1102 
1103  res.success = true;
1104  return true;
1105 }

1107 bool ServoCalcs::changeControlDimensions(moveit_msgs::ChangeControlDimensions::Request& req,
1108  moveit_msgs::ChangeControlDimensions::Response& res)
1109 {
1110  control_dimensions_[0] = req.control_x_translation;
1111  control_dimensions_[1] = req.control_y_translation;
1112  control_dimensions_[2] = req.control_z_translation;
1113  control_dimensions_[3] = req.control_x_rotation;
1114  control_dimensions_[4] = req.control_y_rotation;
1115  control_dimensions_[5] = req.control_z_rotation;
1116 
1117  res.success = true;
1118  return true;
1119 }
